content: **update sep 15th 2025 pattern now available in english ** **overview** the scarf is knitted from end to end in a rhombus textured pattern involving only knits and purls and a double-knitted edging the pattern includes a chart that covers every row of the scarf **measurements of finished object** after blocking the finished scarf has length 115 cm and width 12 5 cm at the widest point **gauge** 28 stitches x 40 row = 10 x 10 cm **needles** 3 5 mm circular needle or straight needles **yarn** 1 ball of filcolana pernilla 50 g = 175 m 3-ply yarn peruvian highland wool colour 337 bright cobalt **included techniques** the textured pattern includes only knits and purls the techniques double-knitted edging left-leaning increase right-leaning increase and left-leaning decrease are all explained in the pattern
